title: Danielle Navarro
text: Hi there! I’m a data scientist, an R developer, and a generative artist. In my day job I work as developer advocate and software engineer at Voltron Data. In former lifetime I was an academic, working as a computational cognitive scientist at UNSW Sydney. In my happier moments I make art from code.
